website_summaries.verdict: This is a very affordable and portable beard and mustache comb, with a protective sheath for travel. We recommend handling with care, but it will prove handy for touch-ups.
pros: Works well with thicker beards, with minimal pulling or tugging
Coarse side also works as a hair comb
Wood absorbs beard oils and balms
cons: Fine-tooth tines can be pointy and sharp
Not as durable as a sandalwood beard comb

customer_reviews.title: I don't ordinarily write reviews but after explaining that this ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't ordinarily write reviews but after explaining that this comb due to no product defect, this seller sent me a replacement come free of charge. I had put the comb in my back pocket and it snapped in two while getting out of my truck. Any wooden comb would do the same thing. Lesson learned, I keep in in my shirt pocket now..
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: My first true beard comb and much better than the lil combe that came with my electric ...
customer_reviews.text: My first true beard comb and much better than the lil combe that came with my electric shaver. I have a thick, dark, 1.5" beard. This has done a great job. Build quality is solid and feels comfortable in the hand. I use the wide teeth for my hair up top when styling. At the price, I highly recommend. If your beard is 3/4" or less, you probably don't need it...but go ahead and grow that sunofagun and get you a comb!
customer_reviews.author: Owens8477

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The comb itself looks nice, from a distance. Upon closer examination you can see that the tines haven't been sanded evenly, some not even sanded at all. This creates a lot of pull while combing your beard, and will cause breakage.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Comb has a film on it.
customer_reviews.text: There is a coating on the comb that's sticky. Tried cleaning and hoping it were off. No chance.
customer_reviews.author: jerome mullen

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a year now and it has held up just fine. No teeth have broken, even the fine ones which I thought at first would be too delicate. But the wood is strong enough to be carried in a front pants pocket in its sleeve. The teeth are sanded smooth so they don't yank out whiskers. If I'm careful and go slow, starting with the coarse side, I can comb it out from its messiest post-sleep condition without pulling any hairs out. The only thing that's not perfect is that it's not 100% static free. Not bad enough to take a star off, but in a dry environment the static can get a little annoying.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: As of April 2020 this seller is shipping a cheap piece of rubber and not a wooden comb...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comb in 2018 and it was great. I just bought it again in April 2020 and I received a cheap rubber comb. Doesn't have any structural integrity to comb hair at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sach

customer_reviews.title: THE Beard comb
customer_reviews.text: This is the one you want. It's ridiculously cheap. It's solid. It's carved from wood. It will last you forever. It's small and portable; slip in your pocket and have silky chint threads all day long. Stop being a hipster and trying to find some ironically-cool beard comb. Some things are just perfect - this is one of those things.
customer_reviews.author: Xeth Waxman

customer_reviews.title: 2 different combs
customer_reviews.text: i re-ordered a second comb because my puppy got to my 1st and i loved it so much. The replacement was not like the original comb i purchased and i was pretty upset. The comb didn't have its beautiful finish on it, it was just a comb with a sanded finish(NOT DONE WELL) i feel like it wasnt completed. When you go to reorder an item you've purchased before from the same company, you expect the same product, right? right! buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Great travel beard comb
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid beard comb. The quality is very nice. The blade spacing is good and I haven’t noticed any chipping of the wood or damage to my beard. I only wish it had a slight contour in shape to make it more welcoming in the hand. It’s a great buy. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan H May

customer_reviews.title: Best Beard Comb I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this comb for about a week. The workmanship on both the comb and the leather case is impeccable. I'm 68 years old and I've had a beard my entire adult life. I've used enumeralbe combs and brushes on my beard and the wide toothed side is the best comb I have found for my long, thick curly beard. The fine toothed side does a reasonably good job on my mustache. I'm and obssesive beard groomer and this comb fits nicely in ether shirt or trouser pockets. I've also purchased the Viking Revolution folding wood beard comb which I will review under that product.
customer_reviews.author: StyxMaker

customer_reviews.title: Turned My Beard Into A Forrest
customer_reviews.text: If you have facial hair (you do), then this is the comb to get. Not only did it make my patches of facial hair turn into a dashing section of the Amazon (<---- ha) Forest, it also made my beard smell like I scraped my newly groomed nature reserve against a bunch of pears who also happen to be made of wood (pear wood... just in case it wasn't clear). I recommend all lumberjacks and lions alike to have one of these combs. It fits perfectly in either front or rear pockets as well.... or your beard. Whichever you prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Great Comb
customer_reviews.text: I have thick curly hair Blonde-White (yes ladies, my hair is awesome). I use this comb on a daily basis and it works great for restoring my natural shine and waviness. I do not use it when my hair is wet as I am not sure how the comb would react to water. It is compact and fits nicely into my briefcase/backpack (whichever one I am carrying) into one of the smaller accessory pockets. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Charles G.

customer_reviews.title: Overall a pretty solid beard comb.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like this beard comb. The coarse side is good for getting the tangles out in the morning which is nice when your beard gets as long as mine. The fine side is nice for smoothing out my beard and combing in oils. The comb itself absorbs some of the oil leaving my beard not too oily but nice and soft. The two complaints I have are: it’s made in China, I don’t know why that surprises me these days but I would rather buy a US product. The second problem is the pleather case I feel should be leather at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Hutch

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this comb because I wanted to make my patchy beard a little softera and look a little fuller. At first combing my beard hurt like hell! But combining this with their beard conditioner and it’s been great. The customer care is also fantastic. I asked what products would be good for coarse hair and they responded immediately. Very impressed. Will be looking into their beard oil next. I am a 27 year old black male with a coarse short beard.
customer_reviews.author: Spence

customer_reviews.title: Great product, amazing follow up
customer_reviews.text: First, I want to say how amazed I was to receive an email from the maker personally to check on how satisfied it was. I have bought many items and have never gotten a personal email ever and for him to do that it made me feel even better about purchasing this comb. I bought this for my husband for Christmas and couldn't wait for him to use it. He has been using a plastic one and said it pulls and hurts. He has used it multiple times today and loves it everytime. He says even with the fine tooth side it doesnt pull.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this comb, especially given the price paid. The fine-toothed side is great for my beard, and the wider side works well for straightening wind-blown hair. It’s compact enough to nestle behind my wallet in the included pouch. Finally, the finish is smooth (no snagging or pulling), and it looks awesome. The Viking logo adds a manly vibe. Bottom line, great product at a good value. Well done Viking Revolution.
customer_reviews.author: LetMeOutside

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Great little comb at a great price! Works perfectly. To those noticing a breaking problem in the reviews? The combs aren't breaking from usage. You'd have to be detangling rope for that to happen. They're breaking because idiots keep them in their back pockets and proceed to sit on them. The comb is made of pear wood which is flexible and washable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jack H

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the picture but not actually useful
customer_reviews.text: This was intended to replace my current wood beard comb that had broken off a corner, the item itself looks as pictured, but it is not fully usable. The comb is supposed to prevent static and hair pulling, but the comb has visible deficiencies at the end of the teeth which cause hair split and a pulling making my beard look very frizzy instead of properly groomed like my old comb. Needless to say I have kept on using the good side of my old comb over this one. Another thing to note, the new comb has a very strong chemical smell when opened, you will need to let it air out for about a day.
customer_reviews.author: JoseN

customer_reviews.title: Low maintenance guy friendly 🧔👍
customer_reviews.text: I got this comb per recommendation of my Jeep dealer when I asked him about his amazing beard and it's care. He swore by the comb and boar hair brush by same company making a point to encourage the brand label. My fiance has enjoyed using the comb a lot which is impressive as he is a very low maintenance guy. 🙃 A wonderful start to his beard care journey. ☺️ Click buy now, you won't regret it at all!
customer_reviews.author: Wiket

customer_reviews.title: I am a viking believer
customer_reviews.text: This is SUCH a great product. For months, I've used a plastic comb, and I THOUGHT it was fine. The reality is that there is no comparison at all. With this comb, my beard is happy now. The two different types of teeth are perfectly prepared (sanded beautifully for zero snags) and effective when used in order from broad to fine. It moves the beard balm through the whiskers and distributes it evenly. Why, oh why did I ever wait? If you love your beard, and you want to make your maintenance easier and more enjoyable, make the purchase. You will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Syllable62

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The fine tooth end is full of burrs and loose splinters. This will ruin your beard and snag hair. I will never go cheap on a beard comb again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K

customer_reviews.title: I love this Comb
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and the craftsmanship is excellent. My favorite thing about this comb is that it comes with a small slip pouch for it, so that if you put it in your pocket lint and debris doesn't get all over the comb. The twice sides is great for how lengthy your beard is, very practical. However, just wish it was a bit slimmer. Recommend this to anyone that needs a nice portable comb for beard or any type of hair.
customer_reviews.author: cmisi

customer_reviews.title: I liked the other comb at first
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comb to replace a fancier one I got from another seller. I liked the other comb at first, but because it was put together with glue, it fell apart after just a few months. This comb, on the other hand, is a fantastic comb. It has a simple design and does an excellent job keeping my beard straight throughout the day. The carrying case is very nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Kind of upset! My husband was so looking forward to this come and he barely had it for one day before it snapped while he was combing his beard. :( dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. I ordered one and he had it in his back pocket and broke it. He liked it so much I reordered and bought him 2. So he has one at home, one at work and broken one he can't part with in car. Delivery time was excellent both times received next day. Hubby loves the craftsmanship and I love the little case yo keep it in. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: flmahi

customer_reviews.title: Quality sandalwood beard/mustache comb
customer_reviews.text: Great little sandalwood beard/mustache comb (also great for when you can't find your hair comb/brush). I have noticed in other reviews the smell is mentioned as a negative, it's sandalwood and it smells like sandalwood (over time the smell will fade away as the wood takes on the scent of what ever oils/waxes you use in your beard/mustache.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to a beard routine.👍
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to put with his Father’s Day gift. It is well made and the perfect size for his pocket or toiletry travel bag. He really likes it. Typically he uses an Afro pick but since he’s gotten this comb, it’s all he uses. I’m pleasantly surprised that he likes it (because he’s picky about his beard tools and products) and I’m always glad to hear him combing thru his beard with it. F.Y.I. He uses the narrow side of the comb.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Viking Revolution is Top Notch 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Viking Revolution Wooden Beard Comb is awesome! Beautifully crafted. Love the leather case pouch it comes in as well. Where my beard length is at the moment I only need to use the fine tooth comb for now. Also so Live Bearded on Youtube uses this exact comb for lining and shaping beards which I plan on doing. Thanks Viking Revolution for your outstanding craftsmanship and customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Comb
customer_reviews.text: I love my beard comb! The quality and craftsmanship are excellent, and it works even better than I thought. I have even begun using it for my hair as well. I would be very careful if you want to make it part of your every day carry arsenal because I could easily see myself breaking it. But for home use, this comb is outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Pittsley

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a portable beard comb I could keep with me. I have a much more expensive beard comb that I keep with my beard kit in the bathroom. This comb has become my go to comb most of the time because it's actually better! Buy this one and comb away! Edit: I ordered a 2nd and 3rd comb. I find I forget to take mine with me and I miss it when I don't have it. The value is unbelievable. You simply cannot go wrong with this comb!
customer_reviews.author: GrzzManBill

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality. The wood looks like the lowest quality wood. There’s dark spots on it that don’t look normal. It’s not fully symmetrical and the logo is even crooked. Not happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Djodyssey

customer_reviews.title: Best beard tool
customer_reviews.text: My husband says this is his fav beard comb. He uses it every time we are in our vehicle to keep his beard looking freshly groomed. The two different comb sizes give two different looks and the wood gives it a bit of shine. Very well crafted and will buy more from this company for his beard. Comes with a nice case as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Lower quality comb than the one included in their Beard Comb & Beard Brush Set.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace the beard comb that came in, but didn't need the other items included in the set. I should've just purchased the bundle again. This beard comb feels as cheap as it is. It feels fragile and light, and the travel case is very thin and flimsy. I wouldn't have had high expectations for such a cheap item if I hadn't already had my expectations exceeded by this company's other products. It's unfortunate, but I'd recommend giving this comb a miss.
customer_reviews.author: FlintStride

customer_reviews.title: Great Comb!
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered + used the comb in a slightly different way. I was looking for a fine tooth comb that was NOT plastic, in order to remove the cradle cap from our son’s scalp. Wooden combs that were specifically for that, were going for @ least DOUBLE the price of yours. Craziness! I literally just finished using it + it did exactly what I needed! It even put our little guy straight to sleep! I would definitely recommend this produce.
customer_reviews.author: Brtt

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I am ashamed to admit how often I use this to comb my beard. It just feels soo cool. I bought this as a suggestion when I bought some beard oil, and I am so happy I did. This comb has become one of my favorite things. My beard feels so good after combing it, and it just looks much neater. I am already planning to buy another one to keep in my desk at work and one for a beard wearing friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Baker

customer_reviews.title: Fits in pocket like it should
customer_reviews.text: I use this 3 times a day on average. It's nice to know I can keep my beard trained without having to worry about damaging it too much, The pocket size and case make it easy to keep track of every day. The wood construction is of good quality, although it is starting to wear a little on the teeth like one would expect of a wooden brush. I think it will last through the semester or better though. I also comb my hair with it on occasion although I recommend a rinse before combing your beard after that if you have dandruff because it catches it much better than a plastic comb.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac M.

customer_reviews.title: Real wood
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem that product wasn't real wood and was plastic. They responded very quickly and said it made out of pear wood. After researching pear wood and taking a snip from the comb revealed it to be real wood!. After telling them they still offered to replace the with additional 20%. Great response and good service!
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay..
customer_reviews.text: I would say a fair to good beard comb. It's durable, compact, the price was reasonable and the case is nice. But the "teeth" seem too thick and bulky to really get a good comb-through even on the thinner "teeth" side. It also has a funky, chemically smell to it which makes it seem like it's manufactured from some type of artifical materials.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Butler

customer_reviews.title: So hey, it’s a comb
customer_reviews.text: It’s a comb, it does comb things. It’s wood, so no beard frizz, it was cheap so it’s better than other wooden combs that look the same, cause it may be cheaper, or not. Combs prices change in the market all the time, economists can’t predict where it’ll go next. Anyway but the comb or not. It’s your life, and maybe your money.
customer_reviews.author: Dude who bought a thing

customer_reviews.title: broke first day
customer_reviews.text: broke in my pocket the first day. not sure what type of wood it is but not very durable
customer_reviews.author: Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Beardtastic!
customer_reviews.text: Cheesy Headline I know, but this Beard Comb Rocks! Now I Was worried it may be thin for keeping in my pocket, but no worries, nice and thick. Loved the carrying case and the Viking Beard Logo! I've always had a neatly trimmed beard, but now I am letting it grow out and and using beard shampoo and Beard oil to do so. I read that a good Beard Comb was needed to help shape and o help brush the oil thru, and this one does the trick, Love it, Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: MoonManTom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has sensitive and very dry skin, and struggles with his love of having a beard and the effects of having one to his dry skin. This comb, he says, was the best thing I’ve ever bought him. He absolutely loves it! The gentleman who made this comb truly cares about the product.
customer_reviews.author: JimiKirkman

customer_reviews.title: If you love a bearded man...
customer_reviews.text: This company is amazing. The product is great, it has a fantastic name and they really went out of their way to make sure I was satisfied with my purchase. I bought this for my boyfriend who has had a beard for over ten years and never got one for himself. The convenient carrying case makes it easy for him to take it everywhere with him. If you love a bearded man, show him by getting him this comb!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny from da pahk

customer_reviews.title: I bought this with some Viking Sandalwood Beard Balm. Good purchase, both of them
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it glides through my beard, even if I am a bit tangled. The balm is nice, too. The comb feels nice in your hands, and the wood is so fine-grained it's hard to believe it's not plastic. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Xaetognath

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Come with a pouch so you could bring it with you and comb your beard throughout the day, overall I like the comb was affordable got two sides so depending on how big your beard is their a fine side and then a bigger open side, style nice and to me it’s nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edges, cut my face!
customer_reviews.text: I shave with a straight razor, and yet this thing cut me haha, it arrived with some sharp edges that i hand to sand down myself. Eh
customer_reviews.author: Scoundrel

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had beard combs in the past (wood/plastic), and this one is is very cheap. Definitely not wood, reeks like glue, and the sleeve feels like a bad pleather. For the price, it’s not even worth the hassle of the return. With all the tlc and money you put into your beard, save an extra 10-20 bucks and buy a quality comb. The quality of the product doesn’t come close to the superior quality of their beard shampoo and conditioner. I would take the comb off the market as it leave a poor reflection on the brand of “Viking Revolution”.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best Beard Comb Ever, Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a goatee. I wanted to get him a high quality beard comb without spending a ton of money. I'm so glad I ordered this product. He loves it so much. The comb itself is a great quality, he says it feels great, it came with a beautiful carrying case, and it's the perfect size for traveling. The cone itself also, to me, looks pretty stylish. And above all else, it's a very affordable price. Plus, the company made it pretty clear to me that they appreciated my purchase. I would say this beard cam was also a perfect gift. If you're thinking about ordering this, just go ahead and get it. It's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Not for medium length beards. (Pulls hair)
customer_reviews.text: The comb is “okay.” My Beard is about 2 to 3 inches, full and pretty strait. The thick side of the comb is too thick and doesn’t comb through, I could see it working well with long beards. The smaller side is too small and not sanded smoothly, it rips hairs out of my face worse than my plastic comb unless I use some kind of conditioner first. I can see it working well with short beards though. Overall, I’ll be sticking with my boars hair brush and I’ll be trying out a different comb.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product, i was surprised by the quality and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, i was surprised by the quality and detail of the logo, you can see very clearly the cool details of the beard in the logo. also, very useful, i was concerned with other beard combs the teeth were not well sanded or cut and they would pull my beard hair, very painful, so this was very good, I used the coarser side when i got it and then decided to trim my beard and used the thinner part of the comb. very nice packaging and good to have the sleeve, also nicely stamped with the logo, all around good product.
customer_reviews.author: victor m mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Used to be great but not so much now
customer_reviews.text: The first time I bought this comb was almost a year ago. It was fantastic for the price and very durable and only broke because it was in my back pocket during a motorcycle wreck. If I was rating that one it would definitely get 5 stars. But this one I bought recently to replace my original lasted me maybe a month. It snapped clean in half from just being in my back pocket. I'll definitely be buying a different comb this time around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brush!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my brush came in broke on the end. But, I just fixed it with come wood glue, not a problem. I’m sure it just got a little damaged on transit, I’m not one to complain since it was a super easy fix. Other than that, it works extremely well and absorbs my beard oil and balm really well. If I ever need a quick brush, it really smooths the beard out and applies the bit of product that it absorbed. I would definitely recommend for my bearded brothers out there, hopefully it doesn’t come in broke like mine, but don’t let that ruin the experience for you. Give it a try, man!
customer_reviews.author: Shai Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Great Comb
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comb as a gift for a friend because I have one that I keep in my truck at all times to comb my beard and he used it on his mustache and loved it. It is a great comb and I recommend it to anyone with a beard or mustache that needs to be groomed.
customer_reviews.author: Codyboy516

customer_reviews.title: Not a good beard comb for African-American hair
customer_reviews.text: It was a horrible comb for my beard. I had a similar comb and I thought I ordered the same one but it wasn’t. It is not good for African-American beards from my experience. It does not catch my hair or even go through it I’m assuming because of the texture. It literally bounces off it won’t go through it. It’s a good price it’s just not a good product. I want my money back but I wouldn’t waste my time going to a place to drop it off for shipping because it’s the same. So I’ll just cut my losses.
customer_reviews.author: YP

customer_reviews.title: Great for long hair as well
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's lightweight and the size is great probably for beards but I use them on my 2ft long hair. It's great for travel. Doesn't break hair. De tangles really well. Use wet or dry. I don't like that it makes that weird laminate kind of sound because the material is so light. Wouldn't be the same if this were heavier wood. But for this price, it's a great, reliable, long life product
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Made
customer_reviews.text: The comb works beautifully. The wood is finished in a manner that prevents snags and the oil I use is already conditioning the product. It arrived in a travel case. It is nice to have a product that delivers on every one of it's claims.
customer_reviews.author: ibm360

customer_reviews.title: Best Comb I've Ever Had!
customer_reviews.text: Stop using the cheap, plastic combs you've been using your whole life and try one of these! Super smooth action, feels and looks great. Working to grow out my beard right now and this comb has been a massive step up from the cheap crap I've had before.
customer_reviews.author: Justin T

customer_reviews.title: Great idea with a few issued
customer_reviews.text: This looks great and is super portable and aesthetically pleasing. However it is difficult to brush anything that isn’t super thick and is very staticky.
customer_reviews.author: K. H.

customer_reviews.title: Just don't drop it...
customer_reviews.text: So the day I went to use this comb for the first time it slipped out of my pocket, fell about three feet, and snapped in half upon impact on my hardwood floor... so now I currently use half a beard comb. I get that combs aren't crafted to withstand a lot of impact, but to fall only three feet and snap in half didn't warrant a very positive reaction from me. That being said, the size is very convenient for daily commute and easily fits in a pocket. I just wish I had a full-comb so the time of combing my beard could be doubled. Time is valuable these days.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Great comb, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little comb and comes with a nice sheath to carry around in your pocket. I received the comb on-time(thanks Viking/Amazon). When I got the comb, the smaller tines were very sharp, so a quick email to Viking, and they got me fixed up with a replacement, and the new comb is awesome! The seller is very responsive and went the extra mile to make sure I was happy with their product!
customer_reviews.author: JAFO

customer_reviews.title: I got Wood!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, but light. Well cut from real wood. Has 2 sides, course and fine tooth. In fact, the course side u can comb ur hair as well! Comes in a nice black sheath. The teeth not sharp so will not damage the skin.
customer_reviews.author: SZEPNSHER

customer_reviews.title: Wooden beard comb
customer_reviews.text: perfect size to stache in the car or carry around. The covid masks are f-ing up my beard game, so I give it a proper adjustment when I take the mask off in the car.. no regrets on this purchase, great quality!
customer_reviews.author: N. stemple

customer_reviews.title: Beard game strong
customer_reviews.text: By far one of my favorite purchases on amazon in awhile! I can’t stop combing my beard! All day long! Very happy with this. Love the sleeve and the sleek way it feels so I can keep it with me. My beard looks much better and the soothing feeling it has while grooming is a plus. I’ll be sure to purchase one or two more for back ups. I tend to lose or leave things behind. I’ll keep one in home, one in car, and one for the pocket or laptop bag for transport. Thanks for the idea, the product, the great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of wood,
customer_reviews.text: Teeth spacing too close on one side and to far apart on the other for it to be successful in combing my particular beard, Pretty cheap for such nice quality. No need to return. [might work for you,,,]
customer_reviews.author: Frank B

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your beard looking sharp! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: First off if you don’t have a comb for your beard....get one. This is awesome it straight up made my beard look 10 x s better, it looks nice, has a nice case . The price is right! Will buy again if I were to loose it. Don’t look any where else you found the right one.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my beard and turns out it just doesn't work well at all. I feel as if my plastic comb that comes with my hair clipper works a lot better. On top of that, i was told it looked like a lice comb people used on their kids head?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVEE
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a stocking stuffer for hubby so he'd stop stealing our babies hair comb for his beard. Definitely was a success and funny. He'll still probably use the pink and white comb. 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Sade

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Comb was broken on arrival, cheap quality. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: perfect solution for me
customer_reviews.text: Needed to stop using my old man plastic comb for my beard as I was losing hairs left and right. This solution allows me to use wider square comb for untangling beard then the finer side for smoothing it all out with minimal to no beard hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H. Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: The comb I received for my husband is beautiful! It is 100% wood and the attention and care put into the finishing really shows! It I should so smooth that it feels soft like a baby’s cheek and the visual depth in the wood is enough to get lost in. My husband loves it. I never thought I’d live to see the day where I would have beard envy!
customer_reviews.author: Angie B

customer_reviews.title: loved it so much that I ordered two more for ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made and just the right size to carry in my shirt pocket! I bought one, loved it so much that I ordered two more for my sons! This is not just the "best deal" - it's the BEST BEARD COMB you can buy in my opinion! It's a very attractive comb as well. I have friends ask about it all the time. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M.White

customer_reviews.title: cool but not durable. broke in half easily when I dropped it on hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: Really like the slim design. Convenient size. appreciate the dual sides with different bristle sizes/spacing. Easily fits in any pocket . Enjoyed using it for a week or so until I dropped it in the hardwood floor and it cracked in half. Yes, I know it is my fault that I dropped it, but I wish it was more durable. If you never drop anything, and if you are looking for a handy, convenient beard comb, then there is no reason not to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Vince O'Leary

customer_reviews.title: Not for thinner beards!
customer_reviews.text: Good for thicker beards and good quality. Doesn’t comb my fine beard at all.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality comb. I have a medium length beard, about 6 inches long, and this comb glides through it like butter where my old titanium comb would tangle and yank a lot of hair out. It also spreads oils and balms throughout my beard well and an added bonus is that it smells great once the sandalwood gets "seasoned" after a few uses with the oils and balms. I'm going to order 2 more of these to keep 1 in my truck and another at work.
customer_reviews.author: Wes B

customer_reviews.title: Nice Comb
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made and good looking comb. The case is a good addition. About the only thing I would change would be to make it a little smaller in order to fit more comfortably in a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Mister

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my boyfriend. He really loves the dual side option (smaller side for mustache, larger side for beard) and the case keeps the comb secure/clean. Size is great to put away in a drawer for daily use, or to bring along for traveling. The comb has been used almost daily for 6+ months, no discoloration yet, no broken comb teeth, and beard oil/balm has not affected the quality either. Great stocking stuffer/gift!
customer_reviews.author: Erin M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, inexpensive and finely crafted
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the fine side as my beard is not long. It feels nice in the hand and smoothly goes through without snags. I have yet to use beard oil with it but will update the review when I have.
customer_reviews.author: EEman

customer_reviews.title: I’m not bearded (female), but my man-friend is..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my man-friend for Christmas to help his beard grooming. The comb itself is very nice, he says the bristles don’t pull his hairs and it slides through his thick scruff.
customer_reviews.author: JohannaMMMmm

customer_reviews.title: Great comb..  great quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for my husband's birthday. He loves it and the quality is awesome. He's super stoked to use something that's a little better for his beard than your run of the mill plastic comb. (Apparently causes breakage) and it fits great in his toiletry bag for his many miles of travel.
customer_reviews.author: C4haun

customer_reviews.title: Nice and solid wooden beard comb.
customer_reviews.text: My last wooden beard comb broke pretty quickly as it was quite flimsy. This one is much more solid, and works very well on my beard. The wider and narrow bristles are spaced perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McPartland

customer_reviews.title: GREAT comb for all beards. Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I like this comb because it's a good size comb and double sided. Works perfectly for my beard, I can almost feel the difference after combining of my skin underneath as well as my beard. I bought a 2nd comb the day after I used.
customer_reviews.author: michael blount

customer_reviews.title: High quality beard comb
customer_reviews.text: This beard comb is a wonderful addition to my collection of grooming tools. The case is perfectly sized and helps keep the comb stay clean. It will be useful as my beard grows longer with the two different comb sizes, narrow for short, wide for long. High quality item!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hague

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Comb
customer_reviews.text: This is my first "wooden" beard/mustache comb. I own several high quality hand cut combs and this little one does as good if not better that those other ones. The wood and case are to my eyes and knowledge of excellent quality. Great for putting in my pocket or leaving on my beard shelf to use throughout the day. Can't beat this little comb.
customer_reviews.author: E.Fleck

customer_reviews.title: My cat likes it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.text: Just a solid piece of wood shaped into a comb. It combs. It can probably be used as a wedge to level things as well. I combed the cat with it and I lived through it. So the cat and I both give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Good comb at a good value
customer_reviews.text: Have used this comb for a little while and I am pleased with the workmanship and quality. I’ve read a couple reviews on poor quality but not in my case. It has a nice finish and smoothly combs through my beard. A little difficult to brush a full mustache due to its size but I guess that’s why they make mustache combs! Give it a try and you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: G. Petito

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the bearded
customer_reviews.text: This comb is great, it’s well crafted, sturdy and gets the job done. Having the beard comb on one end and mustache comb on the other is super convenient. It’s nice to finally be able to comb my beard after a shower. Brushes never really did the trick the way this does. Great to help spread beard oil through. It comes with a nice carrying case and is easy to carry around if you needed to. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey V

customer_reviews.title: Not a very sturdy product. I bought one for my boyfriend and ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a very sturdy product. I bought one for my boyfriend and accidentally ordered two. It's a good thing that I did because it broke within two days of using it. The owner of the company had been emailing asking about the quality of the product up until that point. When I emailed him about the product breaking and what to do about it I did not get a response.
customer_reviews.author: Brit Rasnick

customer_reviews.title: Be the man you’ve always wished you were...
customer_reviews.text: You got a full on-raging beard? Maybe you only got a few lonely whiskers hanging off your chin like a fallout victim. Doesn’t matter! Comb them hairs! And with Viking Revolution’s wooden, dual-tooth beard comb it’s never been easier. What more can I say? It’s quite possibly the best beard comb ever made. And with it’s slick leather sheath, you might just grab the attention of that hot chick from 2B you haven’t had the balls to talk to. Life’s too short to have a raggedy, messy beard. So get ahold of one of these bad boys, comb out that rats nest hangin off your face, and talk to that smoke show from 2B. Cheers, and good luck.
customer_reviews.author: DreamsKollide

customer_reviews.title: Great Company, Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This comb is phenomenal, you could tell immediately from looking at the case that it was worth the price. The comb itself is impressive as well, it has such a nice basic design and all of the teeth just glide right through your beard no matter how knotted you let it get. On top of the quality of the comb you also get the emails from the company thanking you for buying their product and telling you how much they appreciate your business, and it's just a much better experience then they have to provide. If I could review you guys 10x over I would
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Diffin

customer_reviews.title: Pocket sized, simple, effective.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a helmet on a consistent basis and although I have short hair I thought having a portable comb would be nice. I chose this one over a flip out comb for simplicity and durability concerns. It fits nicely into the leather cover and the comb itself seems robust. No overbearing smells from either the comb or the case. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Quality beard comb
customer_reviews.text: This is my second beard comb, but the first Viking Revolution. It has been great for my long thick beard. My first comb from another company broke in half after dropping it in the sink the first week of use. This comb is solid and a great size. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K.

customer_reviews.title: BEST COMB EVER
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is growing his beard out and has been talking about getting a wooden comb, however, has no ambition to order anything for himself. 😂😂 I did some digging and came across this comb and it did not disappoint. It’s made really well, the leather sleeve is a nice touch and it’s the perfect size to be able to carry with him. He loves it! Definitely have ALREADY recommended to some friends and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Hill

customer_reviews.title: Amazing beard wooden comb for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new viking comb it's amazing how it leaves my beard after I use it with oil and balm. As you can see on picture the comb it's absorbing some of the oil from my beard, so I don't have to reapply any during the day. I recommend this 💯.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Orengo

customer_reviews.title: Great! husband loves
customer_reviews.text: My husband broke another plastic comb with his beard so i upgraded him to wood. It works much better, no more struggling to tame his beard in the mornings. and the carry sleeve is nice to keep it clean. he really loved the product
customer_reviews.author: Ivy McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic comb, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son. He really likes the quality of the material the comb is constructed from. He said it works perfectly. This is the second comb I purchased, the first comb was eaten by our new puppy. 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Barbara K.

customer_reviews.title: Gift for husband
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my husband since he's been trying to take care of his awesome beard. I saw this and knew he'd love the size, style and the fact that it has a protective travel case. Looks and feels sturdy enough to handle any rough spots in a beard. No sharp/rough edges all smooth, so no hair will be able to get caught in any nics in the wood. Overall looks to be made fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Long Lasting!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned my combs, and this comb keeps me coming back. Long lasting, I keep my comb in my back pocket and rarely take it out when I sit down. All combs I have tried (and that is many many combs) this Viking brand lasted for 10 months without cracking. All the other combs I’ve tried, they lose their teeth to fast, bent easy so you are left with an oddly shaped comb, and some even just broke in half. But not this Viking comb!
customer_reviews.author: WTH?

customer_reviews.title: Looks manly, sturdy, perfect travel/pocket size.
customer_reviews.text: Me and my hubby gifted it to my bearded besties husband along with some other gifts for his 30th birthday. It was sitting on my kitchen table To remind me to wrap it and every man who came to our house had to pick it up for some reason 😆 must have been a good sign.
customer_reviews.author: D.Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Quality has dropped...significantly
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these in 2017 and it quickly became my go to beard comb: good teeth, satisfying scent, great quality for price. Lost this one recently and decided to reorder (easy decision). When the latest comb arrived, I immediately saw that the wood looked cheaper. Holding the comb confirmed this: biiiiiig quality drop. Feels like a 2-ply that'll snap with the smallest effort. Avoid ordering this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little too thick of a comb for me
customer_reviews.text: The comb works okay, but the results are less than stellar. I prefer using a fine plastic comb for my beard compared to this. This was just a bit to thick to be very effective for my shorter beard. This would probably be great for longer beards.
customer_reviews.author: C. Demeter

product_meta.title: Wooden Beard Comb & Case, Dual Action Fine & Coarse Teeth, Perfect for use with Balms and Oils, Top Pocket Comb for Beards & Mustaches by Viking Revolution
feature_bullets: FIND OUT WHAT YOU’RE MISSING – Find out for yourself, why others are saying this is the best comb they’ve ever come across! This dual sided comb gives the best grooming experience with both its fine and coarse teeth. No static or pulls and great for taking out knots

MAKE HER FALL IN LOVE ALL OVER AGAIN – Look and feel your best with a well-groomed beard. She’ll be sure to notice who the king of the jungle is. Works great for any type of beard, long, short, thick or thin.

COMMAND ATTENTION WHEN YOU WALK INTO THE ROOM – Look and feel like a million bucks! A well-groomed beard will give you the confidence to conquer the world. Comes with a case that makes it easy to carry around without the risk of damaging.

IF YOU CARE ABOUT YOUR BEARD - Why settle for anything but the best. Our Pear Wood Beard Comb is perfect for applying oils and balms. It’s necessary for the health of your beard to stimulate your hair folicles.
THE VIKING GUARANTEE: All Viking products come with a 100% satisfaction guarantee - just contact us if for any reason you’re not happy with your purchase.
